channel.title: Help
channel.description:
I did this topic before but got no answers so i have changed the name of the project lol.
I have a few problems and help about what i would like to do,
1, I have no-ip,server and client running and i have changed all of the server ip and ports but i only can log into local host not the server ip so i gather no one else can log in,I have also portforward.
2,i was on the server having a look round and i was wondering if there was a way you can like change home from Edgvill to lets say dragnor village i think thats the name, i cant remember lol
3,Is there a way from like changing objects around like a bank stand from edvill and turn it around clockwise,(A different direction) or a different location
4,Is there a way you can add objects ?
I hope omone can help this time as last time no one could be bothered to write i dont know, so please help

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Residence Residence
item.description:
@Residence wrote:

Ok thanks i will try that and to the client like at edgvill to add a bank stand to there,

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

  1. It may be your ISP, i had to call them to make my ip different or something and then people were able to play.
  2. Sample: makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, ObjectID, face, 10);
    To change face, change it to -3 -2 -1 or 0 or something like that.
  3. To a client or you want to spawn objects?

Read full topic
